reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stylish and comfortable, with good fabric quality and perfect for wedding or other dressy affairs. They appreciate its flattering silhouette and perfect fit, with one customer noting it falls right above the ankles. While some it's perfectly sized, others mention it runs too small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sizing Was Confusing
items.body: I ordered this dress for a family photo shoot. I liked the style. It fit the color scheme and fall season. Amazon said I should get a large. It was way too big. I had time to get a medium. It was still quite loose in the waist and I looked frumpy. Time was short so I decided to wear it anyway. After machine washing and drying according to directions it was a perfect fit and comfortable. The elastic in the waist and around the wrists shrunk. There were no wrinkles. I didn’t take pictures before washing. Here are pictures of how it looks now. I got many compliments. Read more
items.author: Catherine Sepam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Hourglass Fit – Win-Win Dress
items.body: Can’t believe how much I loved this dress on me! I’m 5’5”, 138 lbs, hourglass with a large bust (34G). I ordered a small but am exchanging for a medium since the bust and shoulder area were too tight. The dress arrived wrinkle-free right out of the package and had no smell. Perfect for season transition—looks great with cute wedges or boots. I love that it covers my arms but the fabric is sheer, so it doesn’t feel heavy. Total win-win! Read more
items.author: Ann Dobek

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: I ordered this to wear at a fall wedding. I'm 5 ft 4 and the dress hits at my ankle. It's beautiful and flowy, and fully lined. The cut is flattering to my curvy shape, and the sheer sleeves elevate the look. And even though it arrived balled up in the package, it wasn't wrinkled, so it should travel well. I can't wait to wear this! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: Dress was cute and petite friendly. I’m 5’1 and it was a great length on me. Flower print was nice. It doesn’t have stretch so I did struggle a little to get the dress off but it fit me well. I think it can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for your money
items.body: Size chart is pretty accurate. Very comfortable and good quality. Love how it fits. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Fall Dress
items.body: I bought this dress for a friends fall wedding. The size was perfect. Beautiful colors for fall. So comfortable and wrinkle resistant. I’ve had so many compliments on this dress. A definite must for your wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Melissa Moles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing
items.body: Fantastic dress. Well-made fits perfectly sized well. Love it. 5”10 145lbs M is great. Read more
items.author: Denise Kent

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for wedding guest
items.body: I wore this for a wedding. It was both dressy and comfy. The fabric was not sheer but was also not heavy. It was a perfect balance. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Pink Floral, Navy Floral, Emerald Green Floral, Pink Floral, Black Floral, Green Floral, Black Orange Floral, Dusty Blue Floral, Black Pink Floral, Navy Blue Floral, Brown Floral, Black White Floral, Navy Pink Floral, Light Green Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
